lead_paragraph: Shares of energy companies dropped as the price of oil continued to fall. The yield on the 10-year Treasury bill fell as traders flocked to low-risk investments.

headline.main: Afternoon Rally Helps Market End Losing Streak

snippet: Shares of energy companies dropped as the price of oil continued to fall. The yield on the 10-year Treasury bill fell as traders flocked to low-risk investments.
abstract: Stocks rise to end five-day losing streak.
